51 
63 int raspicli_get_command_id(const COMMAND_LIST *commands,
64  const int num_commands, const char *arg,
65  int *num_parameters) {
66  int command_id = -1;
67  int j;
68 
69  vcos_assert(commands);
70  vcos_assert(num_parameters);
71  vcos_assert(arg);
72 
73  if (!commands || !num_parameters || !arg) return -1;
74 
75  for (j = 0; j < num_commands; j++) {
76  if (!strcmp(arg, commands[j].command) ||
77  !strcmp(arg, commands[j].abbrev)) {
78  // match
79  command_id = commands[j].id;
80  *num_parameters = commands[j].num_parameters;
81  break;
82  }
83  }
84 
85  return command_id;
86 }
87 
96 void raspicli_display_help(const COMMAND_LIST *commands,
97  const int num_commands) {
98  int i;
99 
100  vcos_assert(commands);
101 
102  if (!commands) return;
103 
104  for (i = 0; i < num_commands; i++) {
105  fprintf(stderr, "-%s, -%s\t: %s\n", commands[i].abbrev,
106  commands[i].command, commands[i].help);
107  }
108 }
109 
110 #endif // __arm__
